description:
Deye 5kw Hybrid Inverter, is suitable for residential and light commercial use, maximizing self-consumption rate of solar energy and increasing your energy impendence.  
During the day, the PV system generates electricity which will be provided to the loads initially. Then, the excess energy will charge the battery via SUN 3/6K-SG04. 
Finally, the stored energy can be released when the loads require it. The battery can also be charged by the diesel generator to ensure uninterrupted supply in the event of grid blackout.
It equipped with RS485/CAN port for battery communication.
The New SUN-3K-SG04LP1 hybrid inverter adopts 24V battery, greatly improving your system safety.

## Description

### Smart Monitoring Platform
Thanks to the smart monitoring platform, Deye full series inverter products support remotely shutdown immediately when accident occurs.Setting parameters and FW update remotely, which makes PV plant O&M easier.
Includes:  Wi-Fi Dongle + BMS Communication Cable

The LuxPower 5KW SNA5000 Off-Grid Inverter is a battery inverter that provides you with a variety of ways to power your household devices.## LuxPower 5KW SNA5000 Description  * Intelligent off grid & hybrid modes
* PV & AC power loads simultaneously
* Wide PV input voltage range
* Easy to use with battery
* Free monitoring & remote upgrade
* Single phase or unbalanced three phase
* Advanced Parallel, up to 50kW
* Separate generator interface available
* Host inverter automatically generated to manage entire system

description:
Introducing HINA ESS PowerGem Plus, our cutting-edge wall-mounted energy storage solution, designed not only for efficient space-saving installation but also without compromising performance.

Fueled by advanced LFP technology, moreover, PowerGem Plus is engineered to deliver an exceptional cycle life, boasting a rated cycle life of up to 8,000 cycles.

What distinguishes PowerGem Plus, in addition, is its seamless remote update capability to ensure it consistently remains equipped with the latest firmware. Furthermore, PowerGem Plus offers remote monitoring features, empowering customers to easily track their battery’s performance from any corner of the globe.

With its intelligent BMS (Battery Management System), PowerGem Plus enables intelligent monitoring as well as precise battery performance management. As a result, it maximizes energy efficiency while minimizing the risk of damage or failure

Eliminate Outages with PowerGem Plus on Standby

PowerGem Plus, the pinnacle of innovation, is designed to harness energy from solar panels or the grid, ensuring backup power is readily available when it matters most. 

Our streamlined and user-centric systems, therefore, are the ideal choice for homeowners seeking a reliable backup power source. By eliminating the hassle associated with traditional backup generators, furthermore, our systems ensure a more convenient and efficient solution for your energy needs.

By embracing PowerGem Plus, homeowners can ensure uninterrupted power for essential appliances during outages, offering peace of mind and convenience.

Furthermore, PowerGem Plus energy storage solutions help reduce overall electricity demand during peak periods, alleviating stress on the grid and potentially reducing energy costs.

description:
Deye 3kw Hybrid Inverter SUN-3.6/5K-SG01/03LP1-EU was created for residential and light commercial use to meet all your energy needs.
The PV system produces electricity during the day, which is initially supplied to the loads. Then, the excess energy will charge the battery, so the excess energy in the battery is available when needed. The battery can also be charged by the diesel generator to ensure power supply in the event of power outage.

### Smart Monitoring Platform
Deye full series inverter products support remote shutdown instantly in the event of an accident because of the smart monitoring platform. Setting parameters and FW update remotely, which makes PV plant O&M easier.
Deye 3kw inverter come with RS485/CAN port for battery communication.

### Deye 3kw Hybrid Inverter Description:
* Colorful touch LCD, IP65 protection degree

* AC couple to retrofit existing solar system.

* Max. 16 pcs parallel for on-grid and off-grid operation; Support multiple batteries parallel

* Max. charging/discharging current of 140A

* 6 time periods for battery charging/discharging

* Support storing energy from diesel generator.

It’s ideal for home and business and scalable so that you can expand it as required.

name: Deye 30kw Hybrid Inverter 3 Phase (SUN-30K-SG01HP3-BM3)
description:
Deye 30kw Hybrid Inverter 3 Phase (SUN-30K-SG01HP3-EU)

The Deye 30kW Hybrid Inverter, SUN-30K-SG01HP3-EU, is a powerful and efficient solution for residential and commercial solar power systems. Thanks to its advanced features, intelligent energy management, and seamless integration capabilities, this inverter maximizes energy utilization, thereby promoting cost savings and reducing reliance on the grid.

Introduction
Solar power is increasingly popular as a clean, sustainable energy source. To maximize its potential, an efficient inverter is essential. The Deye 30kW Hybrid Inverter is an excellent choice for residential and commercial installations, thanks to its advanced features and superior performance. This article explores the Deye 30kW’s key features, benefits, installation process, performance, safety, maintenance, and integration with solar power systems.

Understanding Hybrid Inverters
Before we dive into the specifics, it’s important to briefly understand what hybrid inverters are. In essence, hybrid inverters are sophisticated devices that combine the functionality of a grid-tied inverter and a battery inverter. They allow seamless switching between grid power, solar power, and battery power, thus maximizing energy utilization and reducing reliance on the grid.

Key Features
Packed with an array of features that make it a standout product in the market. Some of its key features include:

High Power Output: Offers a robust power output of 30 kilowatts, making it suitable for both residential and commercial applications.
Three-Phase Compatibility: Designed to cater to three-phase power systems, this inverter ensures smooth operation and balanced power distribution.
Hybrid Functionality: With its hybrid capabilities, the DEYE 30Kw 3 Phase Hybrid Inverter allows for efficient utilization of solar power, battery power, and grid power, optimizing energy consumption.
Multiple MPPT Inputs: This inverter supports multiple Maximum Power Point Tracking (MPPT) inputs, enabling the connection of multiple solar arrays for increased energy harvesting.
Intelligent Energy Management: Equipped with advanced energy management algorithms, the DEYE 30Kw intelligently manages the flow of power, prioritizing renewable energy sources.
Monitoring and Control: The inverter provides comprehensive monitoring and control features, allowing users to track energy generation, consumption, and system performance in real-time.
Benefits of the DEYE 30Kw 3 Phase Hybrid Inverter
Investing in the DEYE 30Kw offers numerous advantages to solar power system owners. Some of the key benefits include:

Energy Independence: By integrating the DEYE 30Kw into a solar power system, users can reduce their reliance on the grid and achieve a greater level of energy independence.
Cost Savings: The intelligent energy management capabilities of this inverter result in significant cost savings by maximizing the utilization of free solar energy and minimizing grid electricity consumption.
Enhanced Efficiency: The DEYE 30Kw’s advanced technology ensures high conversion efficiency, allowing for the optimal utilization of solar energy and reducing energy wastage.
Seamless Integration: This inverter seamlessly integrates with existing solar power systems, making it a versatile solution for both new installations and retrofitting.
Environmental Impact: By harnessing solar energy effectively, the DEYE 30Kw 3 Phase Hybrid Inverter contributes to a greener planet by reducing carbon emissions and reliance on fossil fuels.
Installation and Setup
Installing the DEYE 30kW 3-Phase Hybrid Inverter is a straightforward process. However, it is best to consult a professional solar installer to properly install and configure the system, ensuring optimal performance and safety. Additionally, install the inverter in a well-ventilated area, providing adequate clearance and protection from the elements.
Performance and Efficiency
The DEYE 30Kw 3 Phase Hybrid Inverter is known for its exceptional performance and high efficiency. Its advanced technology and intelligent power management systems ensure maximum power output and seamless operation. The inverter’s high conversion efficiency helps in reducing energy losses and maximizing the return on investment for solar power system owners.
Safety and Reliability
Safety is of utmost importance when it comes to solar power installations. The DEYE 30Kw 3 Phase Hybrid Inverter adheres to stringent safety standards and incorporates various protection mechanisms to safeguard the system and its components. It features comprehensive protection against overvoltage, overcurrent, short circuits, and other electrical faults, ensuring a safe and reliable operation.
Maintenance and Warranty
The inverter comes with a standard warranty, thereby providing peace of mind to users in case of any manufacturing defects or malfunctions.

The DEYE 30Kw 3 Phase Hybrid Inverter seamlessly integrates with solar power systems of various sizes and configurations. Its compatibility with different types of solar panels and battery technologies makes it a versatile choice for residential and commercial applications. The inverter’s intelligent energy management ensures optimal utilization of solar energy, resulting in increased self-consumption and reduced dependency on the grid.
Conclusion
The DEYE 30Kw 3 Phase Hybrid Inverter, SUN-30K-SG01HP3-EU, offers a powerful and efficient solution for harnessing solar energy. With its advanced features, intelligent energy management, and seamless integration capabilities, this inverter provides numerous benefits to solar power system owners. It promotes energy independence, along with cost savings and environmental sustainability, while also ensuring high performance, safety, and reliability.

description:
Fox 30kW 2nd Generation Hybrid Inverter Highlights:

Power Output: The H3 Pro series is available in power classes ranging from 10 to 30 kW.

MPPTs: The H3 Pro series features 3 Maximum Power Point Trackers (MPPTs) for diverse solar-oriented rooftops.

DC Inputs: The inverters have high-current DC inputs.

Integration: The H3 Pro series is designed to integrate with smart homes and Fox ESS energy management systems.

Battery Inputs: The inverters offer a maximum of two battery inputs (2 Ports)* and a vast selection of battery options, enabling customers to expand their capacities up to 66 kWh each by adding 2 stacks of 1 master and 6 slaves ECS batteries.

Parallel Configuration: In industrial/commercial mode, several H3 Pro inverters can be configured in parallel, creating a battery system with a maximum capacity of 660 kWh.

Emergency Power Supply: The inverters are equipped with a built-in emergency power supply, allowing them to establish an independent grid for emergency power supply within 20ms or less during a blackout or grid disconnection.

Plug-and-Play: The H3 Pro series is an easy plug-and-play solution and fits perfectly with Fox ESS high voltage batteries-lines ECS 2800/2900/4100/4300/4800, as well as MIRA and HV 2600 batteries.

Communication Options: This series inverter is available with multiple communication options such as WiFi, GPRS, RS485, and Meter with an external device. Operating information like output voltage, current, frequency, fault information, etc. can be monitored locally or remotely via these interfaces.

description:
DEYE LV Battery AI-W5.1 uses lithium iron phosphate battery pack that provides a safe, reliable energy storage solution for residential and commercial applications requiring power in tight spaces or under load restrictions.

An intelligent battery management system (BMS) monitors critical cell data points like voltage, current and temperature, balancing charging and discharging to maximize the battery’s lifespan.

Modular and flexible, batteries easily expand capacity up to 184kWh by combining clusters of 36 units.

Installation is simplified through a stackable, floor-mounted design without extra wiring or fasteners. 

The battery comes with intelligent remote monitoring for easy maintenance and firmware upgrades.

**Safer**

Cobalt Free Lithium Iron Phosphate (LFP) Battery, safety and long lifespan, high efficiency and high power density. Intelligent BMS, providing complete protection.

**Reliable**

Support high discharge power. IP55, natural cooling, wide temperature range: -20℃ to 55℃.

**Flexible**

Modular design, easy to expand, Max. 6 clusters in parallel(36 pcs), Max. capacity of 184kWh.Suited to residential and commercial applications for increasing the self consumption ratio.

**Convenient**

Battery module auto networking, automatic IP addressing, easy maintenance, remotely monitoring and upgrade the firmware.

**Eco-Friendly**

Use environmental protection materials, the whole module non-toxic, pollution-free.

**Quick Installation**

Flat and stackable design, floor-mounted, no wiring and extra fixing screws, rapid and easy installation.

description:
Pi2R Micro Solar Geyser Controller only has one mode of operation as it cannot communicate with a display.

## Connection without a Display

In this mode temperature can only be set with the existing AC thermostat. No extra settings
possible.

In this mode priority is always given to grid power (AC). This enables the unit to be manually
forced to use grid when DC power is available but not sufficient. Otherwise when DC is only at
10% (for example) then the water cannot be heated up quickly if the user so required.

Thus to automate functionality, AC needs to be switched through a standard geyser timer. This
timer will enable AC at set times to ensure acceptable water. The timer also ensures that DC is used
during sunlight hours as it removes AC during daytime.

Contrary to expectation AC is not always used during these times. AC will be available but not
used when the geyser is warm enough

## Override

The geyser can be manually overridden in order to heat up once-off. Overrides will not repeat
automatically.

## Timers

Two independent timers can be set when AC may be used.
Contrary to expectation AC is not always used during these times.
AC will not be used when:

* Water is warm enough
* Loadshedding

## Temperatures

Two independent temperatures can be set. One for AC and one for DC/PV.
When the Temperature reaches the AC set-point then the unit will switch to PV power if available
(even during Timer operation).
It is therefore important to set the AC temperature lower than the DC temperature, otherwise power
saving will be hindered.

## City of Capetown

Both Pi2R Micro Solar Geyser Controller and iX can be used under Capetown regulations, both are NRCS approved as
required.
name: Pi2R Micro Solar Geyser Controller

name: Deye 16kw Hybrid Inverter (SUN-16K-SG01LP1-EU)
description: Deye 16kw Hybrid Inverter, is suitable for residential and light commercial use, maximizing self-consumption rate of solar energy and increasing your energy impendence.   During the day, the PV system generates electricity which will be provided to the loads initially. Then, the excess energy will charge the battery via SUN 12/14/16K-SG. Finally, the stored energy can be released when the loads require it. The battery can also be charged by the diesel generator to ensure uninterrupted supply in the event of grid blackout. Description Smart Monitoring Platform Thanks to the smart monitoring platform, Deye full series inverter products support remotely shutdown immediately when accident occurs. Setting parameters and FW update remotely, which makes PV plant O&M easier. Deye 16kw Hybrid Inverter Single Phase come with RS485/CAN port for battery communication.

description:
We have taken the Sunsynk 16kW Single Phase Hybrid Inverter to the highest level. Our new Sunsynk MAX is the most powerful low-voltage inverter in the world, achieving a maximum output power of 16kW and a battery charge current of 300A.

This power management tool allows the user to hit those ‘parity’ targets by managing power flow from multiple sources such as solar, mains power (grid) and generators, and then effectively storing and releasing power as and when utilities require.

## Description

### Interactive

* Supporting Wi-Fi or GSM monitoring
* Visual power flow screen
* Parallel / multi invert function grid-tied and off-grid

### COMPATIBLE

* Compatible with main electrical grid voltages or power generators
* Self-consumption and feed-in to the grid
* Auto restart while AC is recovering
* Auto earth bond feature (Via a relay)

### CONFIGURABLE

* Fully programmable controller
* Programmable supply priority for battery or grid
* Programmable multiple operation modes: on-grid/off-grid & UPS
* Configurable battery charging – current/voltage based on the application
* Configurable AC / solar / generator charger priority by LCD setting

### SECURE

* Overload/over-temperature/short-circuit protection
* Smart battery charger design for optimized battery protection
* Limiting function installed to prevent excess power overflow to grid

name: Pi2R iX Solar Geyser Controller
description:
The iX has two different operating modes, one with a display and one without.

## Connection without a Display

In this mode temperature can only be set with the existing AC thermostat. No extra settings
possible.

In this mode priority is always given to grid power (AC). This enables the unit to be manually
forced to use grid when DC power is available but not sufficient. Otherwise when DC is only at
10% (for example) then the water cannot be heated up quickly if the user so required.

Thus to automate functionality, AC needs to be switched through a standard geyser timer. This
timer will enable AC at set times to ensure acceptable water. The timer also ensures that DC is used
during sunlight hours as it removes AC during daytime.

Contrary to expectation AC is not always used during these times. AC will be available but not
used when the geyser is warm enough
## Connection with a Display

In this mode all programming is done via the Display and the existing thermostat is turned up to
maximum temperature to avoid intervening with user settings while still providing a safety backup.
## Override

The geyser can be manually overridden in order to heat up once-off. Overrides will not repeat
automatically.
## Timers

Two independent timers can be set when AC may be used.
Contrary to expectation AC is not always used during these times.
AC will not be used when:

*   Water is warm enough
    
*   Loadshedding
    
## Temperatures

Two independent temperatures can be set. One for AC and one for DC/PV.
When the Temperature reaches the AC set-point then the unit will switch to PV power if available
(even during Timer operation).
It is therefore important to set the AC temperature lower than the DC temperature, otherwise power
saving will be hindered.
## 
City of Capetown

Both Pi2R Micro Solar Geyser Controller and iX can be used under Capetown regulations, both are NRCS approved as
required.
